authors: CREATE TABLE authors(author_id integer auto_increment primary key, fullname varchar(255) not null unique, info varchar(255) default null);
genres: CREATE TABLE genres(genre_id integer auto_increment primary key, name varchar(255) unique not null);
publishers: CREATE TABLE publishers (publisher_id integer auto_increment primary key, name varchar(255) unique not null, email varchar(100) unique default null);
books: CREATE TABLE books (isbn char(13) unique primary key, name varchar(255) not null, image_url varchar(500) default '/images/no_image.png', summary varchar(5000) default null, quantity integer default 0, price float default 0.0, genre_id integer references genres(genre_id) on delete set null on update cascade, publisher_id integer references publishers(publisher_id) on delete set null on update cascade);
writtens: CREATE TABLE writtens (author_id integer references authors(author_id) on delete cascade on update cascade, isbn char(13) references books(isbn) on delete cascade on update cascade, primary key(author_id, isbn));
employees: CREATE TABLE employees (emp_id integer auto_increment primary key, fullname varchar(255) not null, email varchar(100) not null unique, cmnd varchar(20) not null unique, phone_number varchar(20) unique, salary float not null, hash_password varchar(255) not null, role varchar(20) not null default 'EMP');
customers: CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id integer auto_increment primary key, fullname varchar(255) not null, email varchar(100) not null unique, phone_number varchar(20), hash_password varchar(255) not null, address varchar(500) default null);
bill: CREATE TABLE bills (bill_id varchar(255) primary key, total_price float not null default 0, bill_status varchar(50) not null default 'UNCONFIRMED', create_date datetime not null default now(), customer_id integer references customers(customer_id) on delete set null, emp_id integer references employees(emp_id) on delete set null);
billdetails: CREATE TABLE billdetails (bill_id varchar(255) references bills(bill_id) on delete cascade, isbn char(13) references books(isbn) on delete cascade on update cascade, quantity integer not null, price float not null, primary key (bill_id, isbn));
importbookforms: CREATE TABLE importbookforms (form_id integer auto_increment primary key, import_date datetime not null default now(), total_price float not null, emp_id integer references employees(emp_id) on delete set null, publisher_id integer references publishers(publisher_id) on delete set null);
importbookformdetails: CREATE TABLE importbookformdetails (form_id integer references importbookforms(form_id) on delete cascade, isbn char(13) references books(isbn) on delete cascade on update cascade, quantity integer not null, price float not null, primary key(form_id, isbn));
carts: CREATE TABLE carts (cart_id integer auto_increment primary key, customer_id integer references customers(customer_id) on delete cascade, total_price float not null);
cartdetails: CREATE TABLE cartdetails (cart_id integer references carts(cart_id) on delete cascade, isbn char(13) references books(isbn) on delete cascade on update cascade, quantity integer not null, price float not null, primary key (cart_id, isbn));
notifications: CREATE TABLE notifacations (customer_id integer references customers(customer_id) on delete cascade, msg varchar(500) not null);
recoverpassword: CREATE TABLE recoverpasswords (email varchar(100) not null,url varchar(255) not null,create_date datetime not null,role varchar(20) default 'CUSTOMER');
